head.title: Burlington Industries Equity Inc. reports earnings for Qtr to Oct 2

hedline.hl1: Burlington Industries Equity Inc. reports earnings for Qtr to Oct 2

block.p: b-After an extraordinary net charge of $ 34,103,000, which included charge of $ 29.2 million chiefly related to a write-off of unamortized financing costs of the 1992 recapitalization plan, and charge of $ 4.9 million related to use of net operating loss carryforwards in the quarter, and the 9 months included an extraordinary gain of $ 7,969,000, or 12 cents a share, which included charge of $ 29.4 million for early extinguishment of debt and gain of $ 37.4 million related to net operating loss carryforwards, and the 9 months also included a charge of $ 4,482,000 from an accounting adjustment. c-Net income and after an extraordinary loss from retirement of debt of $ 3,902,000. d-Net loss, which included an extraordinary charge for retirement of debt of $ 93,559,000. Latest quarter and 9 months' income from continuing operations of $ 9,040,000, or 13 cents a share, and $ 81,579,000, or $ 1.19 a share, respectively, both included a restructuring provision of $ 11.9 million, which included a charge for the knitted fabrics division and a provision for further costs associated with the restructuring of the carpet division. The company said the previous year's net loss also included a pretax restructuring provision of $ 29.6 million. Share earnings in the previous year follow accrued preferred stock dividiends and accretion of preferred stock.
